title: a critical error has occurred and the process must be terminated league of legends
body: Hi, I've been getting this problem for 2 days and I can't play league. After the champion select it just turns into a black screen and pops out a message saying 'a critical error has occurred and the process must be terminated league of legends', I've tried searching for solutions but none of them work. Any answers? Help is greatly appreciated, Thanks.

replies.body:
Hi there Yaxuo Azurichu,

There are a few reasons you could be having this issue. Below are some things you can try to resolve this issue:

* Restart PC.

* Temporarily Disable any antivirus you may have to see if it is causing the issue.

* Make sure league of legends is not blocked by your firewall.

* Try updating your graphics drivers.

* Initiate a Full Repair (this can be done by clicking the cog in the top right of the client > general > troubleshooting (initiate full repair).

* If you have Cheat Engine installed on your computer, try uninstalling it.

* Uninstall, re-download and reinstall the game.

As usual, if you're having an issue please submit a request to riot player support so they can assist you further:
https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

-Sakio
{{champion:203}}

Could be firewall or anti-virus, particularly if they blocked something while it was patching, so make sure League is listed as an exception for both of those.

Could also be missing assets or a graphics issue so I'd recommend running client repair and making sure your GPU drivers are up to date as well.

Failing all that, a ticket to player support and/or a reinstall are probably going to be your next best options: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
